description:
Milo has been wanting to get into the adult video business for a while. But, he had been playing for a college football team and according to their rules such activity was strictly forbidden. He told me that while he was on the team he had to get permission to have his picture taken for pretty much anything. I'm guessing that the administration would have frowned on this...
In this video, Milo is very friendly, he smiles a lot, and a he laughs at just about everything I say. I think the whole experience was pretty novel to him.
title: Milo
